mosinstall.name: JCE Editor Mambot
mosinstall.author: Ryan Demmer
mosinstall.description:
JCE (Joomla Content Editor) is a configuration and extension system for Moxiecode's TinyMCE editor, for the Joomla! CMS.

Changelog (from 1.1.7):

  • Fixed: Operation aborted error in IE.

Changelog (from 1.1.6):

  • Fixed: Absolute URL issues that caused problems with SEF.
  • Fixed: Encoding issues with ajax calls when using utf-8.
  • Fixed: Paste plugin parameters not saving.
  • Fixed: Style changes not showing in editor.
  • Fixed: Media Manager script mode not being applied.

Changelog (from 1.1.5):

  • Fixed: Logout redirect in Joomla! 1.0.13 caused by simultaneous ajax requests in Manager plugins.
  • Fixed: PHP error in Image Manager if no files in folder.
  • Fixed: JCE Tooltip was selected by default in Class List in Image Manager.
  • Fixed: Error in AdvLink category select.

Changelog (from 1.1.4):

  • Fixed: Ajax problems with retrieving data for Image Manager, AdvLink etc. on some systems. Replaced Mootools Ajax use with simpler solution.

Changelog (from 1.1.3):

  • Fixed: Custom CSS setting bug #5576
  • Fixed: Align default setting bug in Image Manager
  • Fixed: Relative URLs conversion bug #5588

Changelog (from 1.1.2):

  • Fixed: Template Colors in Color Picker
  • Fixed: Paragraph / Break bug - #4767
  • Fixed: TinyMCE Compressor is back
  • Added: Global option for upload dialog - select file after upload.
  • Added: Layer plugin is back.
  • Update: TinyMCE to 2.1.1.1
  • Update: Mootools to 1.1.0

Changelog (from 1.1.1):

  • Added: Configuration options for editor area resizing.
  • Fixed: Image selection error in Image Manager
  • Fixed: Anchors now relative in AdvLink.

Changelog (from 1.1.0 Final):

  • Fixed: Selection error. Bug #4457
  • Fixed: Undefined variable error in folder tree display. Bug #4454
  • Added: Spell Checker languages configuration.

Changelog (from 1.1.0 beta 2):

  • API changes - javascript and php classes.
  • New window dialogs.
  • New icons.
  • Numerous bug fixes and code enhancements.

Changelog (from 1.1.0 beta):

  • Fixed relative url path in JCE class that may have prevented the editor functioning in the frontend.
  • Fixed permissions/access problems affecting user folders.
  • Centralized some Manager related functions.
  • Added 'Verify HTML' option, to specify whether HTML code is cleaned or not (on recommended).
  • Removed xajax functions in favour of a mootools/custom php ajax solution.
  • Added Image and Link commands. The Image Manager and AdvLink plugins automatically overwrite these if installed, therefore only one of each type of plugin can be active at any one time.

Credits:

JCE would not exist without these great libraries/scripts:

  • Joomla! - obviously
  • TinyMCE
  • Mootools
  • PHPThumb
  • getID3
  • dTree
  • Silk icon set 1.3

And these people...

  • My wife, Amoreen.
  • The Joomla Developers
  • The Joomla Forum Moderators, ChiefGoFor and Brad Baker in particular ;)
  • Victor Drover
  • Eric Caldwell
  • Nic from nab_design.de (thanks again for the header graphic!)
  • All the translators - there is a lot more work ahead, I hope you guys are up for it!
  • Everyone who has supported the JCE project by purchasing a subscription
  • Everyone who has supported the JCE project by helping out in the forum
  • Everyone who has supported the JCE project by being patient and well, supportive.
  • Anyone that I should have thanked, but haven't, only because I've forgotten :(

JCE is dedicated to my father.

param.name: editor_width
param.label: Editor Width
param.description: Width of the Editor Window

param.name: editor_height
param.label: Editor Height
param.description: Height of the Editor Window

param.name: editor_state
param.label: Default Editor State
param.description: The default state of the editor - On/Off.

param.name: compression
param.label: GZip Compression
param.description: Compress the editor javascript for quicker loading.

param.name: relative_url
param.label: Relative URLS
param.description: Convert all urls (src, href etc.) to relative links, ie: with your site url removed. (Recommended).

param.name: editor_toggle
param.label: Editor Toggle Label
param.description: The label for the editor toggle link.

param.name: text_direction
param.label: Text Direction
param.description: Ability to change text direction

param.name: charset
param.label: Charset/Encoding
param.description: Charset/Encoding used for header when sending/retrieving data using ajax.

param.name: table_inline
param.label: Inline Table Editing
param.description: Allow inline editing of Tables.

param.name: content_css
param.label: Template CSS classes
param.description: Load CSS classes from template_css.css

param.name: content_css_custom
param.label: Custom CSS Classes
param.description: You can specify the loading of a custom CSS file - simply enter the name of the replacement css file. This file MUST be located in the same folder as you template CSS file.

param.name: newlines
param.label: Newlines
param.description: Newlines will be made into the selected option

param.name: toolbar
param.label: Toolbar
param.description: Position of the toolbar

param.name: verify_html
param.label: Cleanup HTML
param.description: Perform HTML cleanup

param.name: fix_table_elements
param.label: Fix Table Elements
param.description: Block elements will be split into two chunks when a table is found within it to produce an XHTML valid table. See - http://wiki.moxiecode.com/index.php/TinyMCE:Configuration/fix_table_elements

param.name: fix_list_elements
param.label: Fix List Elements
param.description: List elements UL/OL converted to valid XHTML. See - http://wiki.moxiecode.com/index.php/TinyMCE:Configuration/fix_list_elements

param.name: mambot_mode
param.label: Mambot Mode
param.description: If true, & and ' are not encoded when content is saved.

param.name: entity_encoding
param.label: Entity Encoding
param.description: This option controls how entities/characters gets processed by TinyMCE/JCE. The value can be set to numeric, named or raw. The default value of this option is named, if named is used the entities option will be used to convert the codes into names.

param.name: font_size_type
param.label: Font Size Type
param.description: Choose the type of font size to use, either length eg: 10pt, or absolute-size eg: x-small.

param.name: invalid_elements
param.label: Prohibited Elements
param.description: Elements that will be cleaned from the text

param.name: extended_elements
param.label: Extended Elements
param.description: Extend JCE functionality by adding in extra elements here. Format: elm[tag1|tag2]

param.name: event_elements
param.label: Event Elements
param.description: This option should contain a comma separated list of elements thay may have event attributes such as onclick and simmilar. This option is needed since some browsers execute these events while editing content.

param.name: allow_script
param.label: Allow Javascript
param.description: Select access level to allow javascript

param.name: html_height
param.label: HTML Height
param.description: Height of HTML mode pop-up window.

param.name: html_width
param.label: HTML Width
param.description: Width of HTML mode pop-up window.

param.name: preview_height
param.label: Preview Height
param.description: Height of Preview mode pop-up window.

param.name: preview_width
param.label: Preview Width
param.description: Width of Preview mode pop-up window.

param.name: template_colors
param.label: Template Colors
param.description: A comma seperated list of colors to be used by the JCE ColorPicker, in Hex format, eg: #ff0000, (Maximum 18).
